attributes.action: Reverse the reduction in Solar FiT
attributes.additional_details: The recent revision in the deadline for FiT Tariff reduction and the draconian reduction will hurt our ability to meet carbon reduction targets, reduces trust in the government and will prevent people from contributing to the carbon reduction.  The current ability to pay for Solar Power in 10 years (or so) means that it is a realistic aim for the average house holder.  I can upon the government to return to the original published timetable and rebuild trust with the home owner and build upon the momentum gained to move to a greener PV future. and safeguard the UK PV solar industry
